events.message: We have successfully received the candidate's application for the software engineer position, including their resume and cover letter.
The application has been reviewed and categorised under the engineering cluster based on the candidate's experience and role applied for.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles was assigned to manage the candidate's recruitment process from this point forward.
The initial phone screening was conducted to assess the candidate's software development skills and cultural fit for the team.
The candidate responded promptly to the screening feedback and expressed strong enthusiasm for proceeding to the technical interview stage.
A technical interview has been scheduled with the engineering panel to further evaluate the candidate's coding and problem-solving abilities.
